title: String Concatenation
text: To concatenate, or combine, two strings you can use the + operator.

Example
Merge variable a with variable 
b into variable c:

  a = "Hello"b = "World"c = a + b
print(c)

Try it Yourself »

Example
To add a space between them, add a " ":

  a = "Hello"b = "World"c = a + " " + b
print(c)

Try it Yourself »
